signature: RTree<T, S> read(InputStream, long, InternalStructure) throws IOException

enhanced_by.reason: The read method relies on the readFully method to read the input stream fully before processing it.
The read method uses the create method to instantiate the SerializerFlatBuffers object, which is necessary for deserialization.
Both read and toNodeDefault methods handle the deserialization of nodes from the input stream, making them useful for constructing assertions.
The createEntries method is used in the deserialization process, similar to the read method, and can help in constructing assertions for the read method.
